name: Annual salary 1 (low)
description: Annual salary for an entry-level employee such as an assistant, manager, coordinator, IT Specialist, Public Relations Officer, or other entry-level position
sources: Approximate, based on WHO-CHOICE personnel costs

name: Annual salary 2 (mid)
description: Annual salary for a mid-level employee such as a Public Health Specialist, lawyer, or other mid-level position
sources: Approximate, based on WHO-CHOICE personnel costs

name: Annual salary 3 (high)
description: Annual salary for a high-level employee such as a Public Health Director or other high-level position
sources: Approximate, based on WHO-CHOICE personnel costs

name: Consultant fees (daily)
description: Daily fees and per diem for a typical consultant
sources: Fees per day (750.00 USD) plus daily per diem (298.00 USD), rounded to nearest hundred. Default fees per day is UN Level D maximum daily rate established October 2013 (Source: ST/AI/2013/4). Default per diem is official WHO/UN per diem for Nairobi, Kenya.

name: Consultant travel
description: Per trip travel expenses for a typical consultant
sources: Cost of typical roundtrip airfare from US or Europe to national capital (1,200.00 USD). Based on average round-trip airfares from Washington, DC USA to multiple African and Asian air hubs with 30-day advance purchase.

name: Trainer / supervisor per diem, with meals
description: Per diem for trainer / supervisor that includes meals

name: Cellular phone
description: Mobile phone (capital cost)
sources: Divided handset cost (200.00 USD) over 5 years and added to annual cellular data plan cost (240.00 USD), rounded to nearest hundred.

name: Cellular and data plan
description: Cellular and data plan for mobile phone
sources: Based on sequential Safaricom 90 day plan costs

name: Computer system with office software
description: Computer system with standard office productivity software
sources: 544.00 USD plus 200.00 USD, rounded to nearest hundred.

name: Office broadband data plan
description: Annual cost for office-wide broadband computer internet access
sources: Approximate, based on cost of 60 + Mbps, Unlimited Data, Cable/ADSL in Kenya (http://www.numbeo.com/cost-of-living/country_result.jsp?country=Kenya)

name: Small print job
description: Cost per small print job (10 - 200 pages)
sources: 0.05 USD per page for 200 pages. Based on industry low-end estimate for black and white printing.

name: Large print job
description: Cost per large print job (> 200 pages)
sources: 0.05 USD per page for 500 pages. Based on industry low-end estimate for black and white printing.

name: Meeting - Small
description: Cost to hold a small meeting, including those that are training sessions or workshops

name: Meeting - Medium
description: Cost to hold a medium meeting, including those that are training sessions or workshops

name: Meeting - Large
description: Cost to hold a large meeting, including those that are training sessions or workshops

name: Per diem for meeting - Domestic
description: Domestic per diem for attendees of meetings
sources: Default domestic per diem (105.00 USD) based on WHO-CHOICE National-Level Per Diem in USD 2017.

name: Per diem for meeting - International
description: International per diem for attendees of meetings
sources: Default international per diem (298.00 USD) is official WHO/UN per diem for Nairobi, Kenya (http://apps.who.int/bfi/tsy/PerDiem.aspx).

name: Computer server system
description: Cost of a single computer server system
sources: Prior GHSS research

name: Computer server system annual maintenance
description: Annual maintenance fee for a single computer server system

name: Specialized computer software license
description: Annual fee for specialized commercial computer software (e.g., data analysis tools)

name: Annual rental costs for 1,000 sq. meter national stockpile storage facility
description: Annual rental costs for national stockpile storage facility
sources: Prior GHSS research

name: Medical countermeasures stockpile kit
description: Medical countermeasures stockpile kit
sources: Prior GHSS research

name: Delivery truck
description: Delivery truck
sources: Prior GHSS research

name: Medical countermeasures stockpile contents management/inventory system
description: Medical countermeasures stockpile contents management/inventory system
sources: Prior GHSS research

name: Vaccine
description: Approximate cost of single measles vaccine
sources: Approximate cost of measles vaccine (http://www.avenirhealth.org/software-onehealth.php)

name: Refrigeration equipment
description: Refrigeration system
sources: Assume one medium-sized laboratory refrigerator and one cooler; some, but not all, solar, from https://www.unicef.org/supply/files/Solar_Direct_Drive_Price_Overview.pdf (assume partial medium-sized normal laboratory refrigerator ~$1,500 USD and some solar refrigerators)

name: Office acquisition cost per occupant
description: Cost of purchasing office space per initial occupant
sources: WHO-CHOICE estimates; assume 19 sqm per employee and that building is purchased; Purchase cost estimated based on cost of large commercial building in Kilimani, Kenya [KShs 15,500/sq foot * 10.8 sq ft/sq m * 19 sq m/employee]. Source: http://www.buyrentkenya.com/commercial

name: Office technology cost per occupant
description: Shared office technology costs (e.g. fax machine, printer, landlines)
sources: Assume one large combined printer and fax machine is shared by 25 people (~$250 USD); cost of 1 basic landline phone per person (~$25 USD)

name: Office broadband internet and cellular data plan
description: Cost of shared office internet and cellular data plan
sources: Medium-sized office infrastructure: https://www.safaricom.co.ke/business/sme/fixed-line-solutions/fibre-for-business

name: Laboratory construction cost
description: Cost to build a new laboratory (building only)

name: Radiation alarm
description: Cost of a radiation alarm
sources: Low end of price range cited at http://www.ehstoday.com/fire_emergencyresponse/ehs_imp_12512

name: Geiger counter
description: Cost of a Geiger counter
sources: Low end of price range cited at http://www.ehstoday.com/fire_emergencyresponse/ehs_imp_12512

name: Gate monitor
description: Cost of a gate monitor
sources: Low end of price range cited at http://www.ehstoday.com/fire_emergencyresponse/ehs_imp_12512

name: Personal dosimeter
description: Cost a personal radiation dosimeter
sources: Based on average cost of typical dosimeters (e.g., http://ludlums.com/store/price-lists)

name: Air quality sensor
description: Cost of a commercial air quality sensor
sources: Based on cost of a typical air quality sensor, per US EPA report: https://developer.epa.gov/air-quality-sensors/

name: Mass spectrometer
description: Cost of a commercial mass spectrometer
sources: Based on cost of a typical mid-grade LCMS unit found in equipment catalogs (e.g., https://conquerscientific.com/lab-equipment/mass-spectrometers-lcms-systems/)

name: Chemical information database annual subscription fee (6-10 users)
description: Cost of an annual subscription fee
sources: Based on INTOX annual subscription fee, source: http://www.who.int/ipcs/poisons/intox_dms/en/

name: Portable chemical detector/alarm systems
description: Cost for a personal chemical detector
sources: Based on cost of a typical portable multi-agent chemical detector (http://www.globalsecurity.org/military/library/budget/fy2000/dot-e/other/00jcad.html)

name: Personal protective equipment (chemical)
description: Cost for personal protective equipment (cover-all suit) for handling chemicals
sources: Based on cost of typical chemical cover-all suit (e.g., http://www.envirosafetyproducts.com/chemical-protective-clothing.html)

name: Self-contained breathing apparatus
description: Cost of self-contained breathing apparatus for protection from fallout hazard
sources: Based on cost of typical self-contained breathing apparatus (e.g., https://www.grainger.com/category/ecatalog/N-1z0dssl)

name: Biometric lock system
description: Cost of a bio
sources: Source: http://www.fingerprintdoorlocks.com/commercial-fingerprint-door-locks/

name: Disinfection, decontamination, and vector control kits
description: Kits assumed to include: Sodium hypochlorite solution 4-6%; 5 L bottle Calcium hypochlorite powder; 70%, 40 kg LYSOL Disinfectant Cleaner; (5L)Alpha-cypermethrin SC 10%; Permethrin EC (10% solution); Rodenticides: Brodifacoum (0.2 g/kg pellets); Rodenticides: Bromadiolone (0.005% block bait); Isopropyl alcohol solution; 70% Antiseptic Liquid Soap
sources: Source: prior GHSS research

name: Outbreak investigation kit
description: Kit assumed to include PPE and supplies for documentation, as well as supplies necessary to safely collect and transport samples
sources: Source: prior GHSS research; Market value of the entire inventory of items on the WHO outbreak investigation kit list in Communicable disease control in emergencies: a field manual (2005), adjusted to USD 2011.

name: Vehicle - ambulance
description: Cost of a single ambulence equipped for patient transport
sources: Prior GHSS research [from capacity-building project in Tanzania (Boulenger, Stephanie, MS, Tania Dmytraczenko, PhD. Cost of Family Care International’s Skilled Care Initiative in Kenya and Tanzania. August 2007. Bethesda, MD, Abt Associates Inc."]

name: Vehicle maintenance - ambulance
description: Annual maintenance fee for a single ambulence equipped for patient transport
sources: Source: prior GHSS research [0.09 unit cost per km per vehicle. Average use estimated to be 36,213 km per year. Per vehicle x 1 per international PoE x # of PoE; Vehicle usage information is extrapolated from “Nairobi, Kenya Vehicle Activity Study”]

name: 5-day technical training course in software and systems
description: Cost of one-time technical training course
sources: Source: GHSS tool assumptions

name: Landline telephone
description: Cost of landline telephone
sources: Source: GHSS tool assumptions

name: Cost per three-minute local call
description: Cost of local three-minute call
sources: Source: GHSS tool assumptions

name: Fax machine
description: Cost of a fax machine
sources: Source: GHSS tool assumptions

name: Printer / Copier
description: Cost of a combined printer and copier
sources: Source: GHSS tool assumptions

name: Annual stipend for community health worker
description: Cost of annual stipend for community health worker
sources: Source: GHSS tool assumptions

name: Annual toll-free service plan
description: Cost of annual toll-free service plan
sources: Source: GHSS tool assumptions

name: Rapid response kit
description: Cost of a rapid response kit, including consumables, PPE, and sample collection supplies.
sources: Source: GHSS tool assumptions built from Market value of the entire inventory of items on the WHO outbreak investigation kit list in Communicable disease control in emergencies: a field manual (2005).

name: Annual subscription to AMR core standards document
description: Cost of annual subscription to AMR core standards document
sources: Source: GHSS tool assumptions

name: Airborne infection isolation room
description: Cost of a single airborne infection isolation room
sources: Source: GHSS tool assumptions

name: Standard database software license
description: Cost of database software license
sources: Source: GHSS tool assumptions

name: National television airtime (per 1-minute message)
description: Cost of one minute national television airtime
sources: Source: WHO-CHOICE: http://www.who.int/choice/costs/prog_costs/en/index1.html

name: National radio airtime (per 1-minute message)
description: Cost of one minute national radio airtime
sources: Source: WHO-CHOICE: http://www.who.int/choice/costs/prog_costs/en/index1.html

name: 1/4-page advertisement in national newspaper (per day)
description: Cost of 1/4 page newspaper advertisement
sources: Source: WHO-CHOICE: http://www.who.int/choice/costs/prog_costs/en/index1.html

name: Epidemiology training consumables
description: Cost of epidemiology training consumables
sources: Source: GHSS tool assumptions

name: Physical infrastructure for Emergency Operations Center
description: Physical infrastructure for EOC, including IT equipment, electrical works, civil works, and lighting
sources: Based on actual costs for the development of an Emergency Operations Center for the Ministry of Health in Jordan; Assume that physical location already exists but requires basic structural modifications; Source: GHSS materials (EOC detailed budget)

name: Cooler with ice packs
description: Cost of a 24 quart cooler and two reusable ice pack
sources: Based on cost estimates from Home Depot in 2017 USD

name: Microscopy and bacterial culture capability start-up costs
Microscopy and bacterial culture capability annual upkeep costs
Virus culture, serology, and PCR capability start-up costs
Virus culture, serology, and PCR capability annual upkeep costs
National laboratory facility annual upkeep costs
Malaria rapid diagnostic tests
sources: $1 per test as of 2017: http://www.wpro.who.int/malaria/NR/rdonlyres/0A45DF24-4245-4BF3-96E7-5F1150AF333B/0/DeterminingCostEffectivenessofRDTsinruralareaswithhighprevalence.pdf

name: Influenza rapid diagnostic tests
sources: $7 per test as of 2017: http://www.cliawaived.com/cf.inventory.htm?action=showinvone&invid=4600&head=SA+Scientific+Flu+Alert&key=SAS-+046230SA+Scientific+Flu+Alert&desc=Detects+Influenza+A+and+B.+30+tests+per+kit+%2815+Flu+A%2F15+Flu+B%29.+Results+in+15+minutes.%0D%0A-Easy+to+read%0D%0A-Fast%2C+easy+and+reliable%0D%0ADetects+Flu+A+and+B%2A%0D%0ASensitivity%2FSpecificity%3A+A%3A+76%25%2F97.9%25+B%3A+90.5%25%2F%3E99%25%0D%0AThis+item+is+CLIA+Waived.+CPT+Code%3A+87804QW%0D%0A%0D%0A%2AThe+SAS+Flu+A+%26+B+are+run+separately.+Consequently%2C+reimbursement+can+be+claimed+when+running+each+Flu+A+and+Flu+B+assay.

name: Cholera rapid diagnostic tests
sources: $1.90 per test as of 2014: https://www.stopcholera.org/sites/cholera/files/manual_dipstick_surveillance_using_dipstick_3_30_14_workingdoc.pdf

name: National vaccine coverage survey
description: National coverage survey system or system of administrative records to monitor and demonstrate vaccination rates, including personnel costs, travel costs, and materials costs
sources: Development of syndromic surveillance in Boston (accuate care settings) costed at approximately $425,000 USD over 1.5 year period, including personnel costs, equipment costs, and travel costs  [http://journals.lww.com/jphmp/Abstract/2007/03000/Direct_Cost_Associated_With_the_Development_and.17.aspx]; Development of vaccine-preventatable disease surveillance system in Costa Rica costed at approximately $422,000 USD in 2013 over 1 year period, including personnel costs, equipment costs, office costs, and travel costs  [https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC4654566/pdf/nihms-737714.pdf]. Also note: World Health Organization Regional Africa office estimates cost of 0.03 USD 2011 per child for vaccine monitoring and evaluation [http://www.measlesrubellainitiative.org/wp-content/uploads/2013/06/WHO-AFRO-Measles-Fieldguide-April-2011.pdf].
